summary: This document is an email correspondence from Jeffrey Epstein discussing his busy schedule with deals and mentioning financial markets. He references a recent event and notable figures in the financial sector, indicating his connections and involvement in high-level financial discussions.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing his busy schedule and financial dealings.

persons.name: Paulson
persons.context: Paulson is mentioned as taking over the Agencies, indicating his influence in the financial markets.

persons.name: Jamie
persons.context: Jamie is referenced in relation to a Fortune magazine cover, suggesting his prominence in the financial sector.

keyFacts: The email was sent by Jeffrey Epstein on September 7, 2008.
Epstein mentions he is busy with several deals.
Paulson is taking over the Agencies, indicating a significant shift in the financial landscape.
The financial markets are described as being in a mess.
Fortune magazine features Jamie and his CEOs on the cover, highlighting their prominence.
